nav.footerDescription: Providing high-quality AI image and video generation services for e-commerce businesses

hero.title: Product visuals that
hero.description: Generate professional product images and videos with AI.
hero.descriptionSub: No photoshoot. No editing. Just results.
hero.featureImageDesc: Text-to-Image and Image-to-Image with brand tone analysis
hero.featureVideoDesc: Text-to-Video and Image-to-Video with multiple video styles
hero.featureBatchDesc: Excel/CSV batch upload, one-click generation and publishing to e-commerce platforms

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to generate professional content
howItWorks.step1Desc: Upload Excel/CSV files or directly input product information
howItWorks.step2Desc: System automatically analyzes brand tone, optimizes prompts, and generates high-quality content
howItWorks.step3Desc: Preview generated results, batch download or one-click publish to e-commerce platforms

features.title: Everything you need to create
features.subtitle: Our AI-powered platform combines cutting-edge technology with intuitive design to help you create professional product images and videos in minutes, not days.

batch.title: Batch image and video generation at scale
batch.description: Upload Excel/CSV files to generate hundreds of product images and videos simultaneously. Perfect for e-commerce businesses that need to create content for large product catalogs.

benefit1.title: Excel/CSV batch upload
benefit1.desc: Upload spreadsheets with product data and generate content in bulk

benefit2.title: One-click publishing
benefit2.desc: Automatically publish generated content to e-commerce platforms

benefit3.title: Time-saving automation
benefit3.desc: Reduce manual work from days to minutes with automated workflows

brand.title: AI-powered brand tone analysis
brand.description: Our advanced AI analyzes your brand's website and product information to understand your brand tone, style, and messaging. This ensures every generated image and video perfectly matches your brand identity.

benefit1.title: Automatic brand detection
benefit1.desc: AI analyzes your website to understand brand colors, style, and tone

benefit2.title: Enhanced prompts
benefit2.desc: Automatically optimize prompts based on brand analysis and product selling points

benefit3.title: Consistent brand voice
benefit3.desc: Ensure all generated content aligns with your brand identity

quality.title: Professional quality with creative freedom
quality.description: Generate stunning, high-resolution images and videos that rival professional photography. Our AI models produce creative, unique content that stands out from the competition.

benefit1.title: 4K resolution output
benefit1.desc: Generate ultra-high quality images and videos suitable for any use case

benefit2.title: Creative AI models
benefit2.desc: Access to cutting-edge AI models for maximum creativity and visual appeal

benefit3.title: Multiple styles & formats
benefit3.desc: Choose from various artistic styles, aspect ratios, and video formats

imageGeneration.title: AI Image Generation
imageGeneration.subtitle: Create stunning images with AI. Enhance your prompts with brand analysis and product selling points.

videoGeneration.subtitle: Create professional e-commerce product videos. Supports Text-to-Video and Image-to-Video modes.
videoGeneration.productSellingPointsPlaceholder: e.g., High quality, fast charging, long battery life

batchGeneration.title: Batch Generation
batchGeneration.subtitle: Upload Excel/CSV files to batch generate images and videos, and automatically publish to e-commerce platforms
batchGeneration.subtitleImage: Upload Excel/CSV files to batch generate product images
batchGeneration.subtitleVideo: Upload Excel/CSV files to batch generate product videos
batchGeneration.clickToUpload: Click to upload or drag and drop files
batchGeneration.browserNotSupportVideo: Your browser does not support video playback
batchGeneration.uploadCSVOrExcel: Please upload CSV or Excel files
batchGeneration.enhancePromptPlaceholder: Click the button on the right to enhance Prompt, or enter manually
batchGeneration.instruction2: Fill in generation parameters for each row (prompt, generationMode, etc.)
batchGeneration.instruction3: Fill in product information (if selecting product publishing mode)
batchGeneration.instruction4: Specify publishing platforms (publishPlatforms field, comma-separated, optional)
batchGeneration.instruction5: Upload the filled file, system will automatically generate
batchGeneration.instruction6: After generation, you can preview, download, or download updated template with URLs

assets.title: Asset Library
assets.subtitle: View and manage all generated content

publishing.previewDesc: Preview generated content, then publish to multiple e-commerce platforms with one click
publishing.mediaOnlyDesc: Only upload images/videos, do not create products
publishing.fullProductDesc: Upload media and create/update product information

batchResults.title: Batch Generation Results
batchResults.downloadUpdatedTemplateDesc: Download CSV/Excel file containing generated asset URLs
